content.raw: The downside of cloning multiple times, each just the branch we want, is that we clone the same history several times. And the downside of having directories in parallel is that every change to a tutorial needs to be repeated for every file, instead of merged forward. I can see us going either way.
content.html: The downside of cloning multiple times, each just the branch we want, is that we clone the same history several times. And the downside of having directories in parallel is that every change to a tutorial needs to be repeated for every file, instead of merged forward. I can see us going either way.
